member.name: T:SaaUI.SaaExtensions
member.summary: This class contains extensions that you may find helpful.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.GetSize(System.String,System.Drawing.Font)
member.summary: Provides the of the specified text when drawn with the specified font.
member.returns: Returns in pixels, Size the text requires

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.GetSize(SaaUI.SaaToast)
member.summary: Gets the total Size (including Offsets) of all toasts that are open and visible on the screen.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.GetSize(SaaUI.SaaToast,SaaUI.ToastPosition)
member.summary: Gets the total Size (including Offsets) of all toasts that are open and visible on the screen in the specified position.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.ToHEX(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Converts to Hexadecimal

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.ToRGB(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Converts to RGB
member.returns: returns color in RGB like RGB(255,255,0)

member.name: P:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.NewID
member.summary: Generates globally unique ids. The possibility of generating same Id for lifetime is 0%.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.GetTransparency(System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32)
member.summary: Makes a color transparent in the given percentage.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.LocationRelativeToForm(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Gets the location of a control relative to where it appears on the form. No matter if the control is inside other containers or nested containers.
member.returns: Location of the control relative to where it appears on the form.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.MouseLocation(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Gets mouse location relative to the parent form. It returns if the mouse is outside the form.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.InnerMouseLocation(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Gets mouse location of a control relative to itself. This is the position of the mouse pointer within the control. If the mouse pointer is outside the control then it returns -1 (both X and Y).

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.SetDoubleBuffering(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Boolean)
member.summary: SetDoubleBuffering(Control) enables or disables doubleBuffering for a control. Flag (true/false) tells whether to enable or disable.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.Contains(System.String[],System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks whether string array has the specified item in its collection.
member.returns: returns true if the item exists in the collection.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.CopyPropertiesFromExcept(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.String[])
member.summary: Copies properties from the specified control to this control.
member.param: (optional) properties to skip. Put 'null' to skip nothing.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.CopyPropertiesFrom(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.String[])
member.summary: Copies specified properties from the specified control to this control.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.SetProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets property to an object.

member.name: M:SaaUI.SaaExtensions.GetProperty(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Gets property value of an object.
member.returns: Value of the property as an object.

member.summary: Converts string array to List.
